alert.note: Alert for Adams (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 9:12PM CDT until May 14 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois... Missouri... Mississippi River at Grafton. Mississippi River at Lock & Dam 21. Mississippi River at LaGrange. Mississippi River at Quincy. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Saverton. Mississippi River at Canton. Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Louisiana. Mississippi River at Clarksville. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at LaGrange. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, The entrance to the lower parking lot at the Mark Twain Casino begins flooding near this height, requiring the use of an alternate entrance. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Bankfull stage is 16.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Tuesday was 18.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Mississippi River LaGrange 17.0 18.0 17.8 17.4 17.0 16.6 16.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
